text:
May 13, 1959
Mr. Joseph M. McDaniel, Jr., Secretary
The Ford Foundation
477 Madison Avenue
New York 22, New York
Dear Mr. McDaniel:
This will acknowledge with sincere thanks your
letter of May 6, In which you advise of extension of
time on previous grant from the Ford Foundation to the
National Association of Educational Broadcasters.
Other terms of the grant remain the same.
Sincerely yours
Frank E- SchOOlpy
FES j dc
cc: Mr. Harry J. Skornia
